sqlMap.select:
select
, (select V.ORG_NAME from V_ZC_FA_ORG_VIEW V WHERE ZC_FA_CARD.ND=V.ND AND ZC_FA_CARD.CO_CODE=V.CO_CODE AND ZC_FA_CARD.USE_ORG_CODE=V.ORG_CODE) AS USE_ORG_NAME, (SELECT VT.FATYPE_CODE||VT.FATYPE_NAME FROM V_ZC_FA_TYPE VT WHERE ZC_FA_CARD.FATYPE_CODE=VT.FATYPE_CODE) AS FATYPE_NAME, (select ma_company.co_name from ma_company where ma_company.co_code=ZC_FA_CARD.co_code and ma_company.nd=ZC_FA_CARD.nd) as co_name from ZC_FA_CARD ZC_FA_CARD where 1=1
ZC_FA_CARD.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_FA_CARD.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_FA_CARD.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_FA_CARD.process_inst_id) and ZC_FA_CARD.CARD_STATU!= 'cancel' and ZC_FA_CARD.CARD_STATU not in('B','C','D')
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_FA_CARD.process_inst_id) or ZC_FA_CARD.process_inst_id = -1 ) and ZC_FA_CARD.CARD_STATU ='1'
(ZC_FA_CARD.CARD_STATU in('B','C','D'))
ORDER BY ZC_FA_CARD.INPUT_DATE DESC

select
, (select V.ORG_NAME from V_ZC_FA_ORG_VIEW V WHERE ZC_FA_CARD.ND=V.ND AND ZC_FA_CARD.CO_CODE=V.CO_CODE AND ZC_FA_CARD.USE_ORG_CODE=V.ORG_CODE) AS USE_ORG_NAME, (SELECT VT.FATYPE_CODE||VT.FATYPE_NAME FROM V_ZC_FA_TYPE VT WHERE ZC_FA_CARD.FATYPE_CODE=VT.FATYPE_CODE) AS FATYPE_NAME, (select ma_company.co_name from ma_company where ma_company.co_code=ZC_FA_CARD.co_code and ma_company.nd=ZC_FA_CARD.nd) as co_name from ZC_FA_CARD ZC_FA_CARD where ZC_FA_CARD.card_id=#value#

VOU_FISCAL_PERIOD = #vouFiscalPeriod:DECIMAL#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, CARD_UUID = #cardUuid:VARCHAR#, IS_ADD_IN_SERVER = #isAddInServer:VARCHAR#, HAS_UPDATE = #hasUpdate:CHAR#, UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:DATE#, FA_ITEM_N30 = #faItemN30:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N31 = #faItemN31:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N32 = #faItemN32:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N33 = #faItemN33:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N34 = #faItemN34:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N35 = #faItemN35:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N36 = #faItemN36:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N37 = #faItemN37:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N38 = #faItemN38:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N39 = #faItemN39:DECIMAL#, FA_ITEM_N40 = #faItemN40:DECIMAL#, IS_SECRET = #isSecret:CHAR#, USE_ORG_CODE = #useOrgCode:VARCHAR#, USE_EMP_NAME = #useEmpName:VARCHAR#, USE_EMP_CODE = #useEmpCode:VARCHAR#, IS_MADE_BARCODE = #isMadeBarcode:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:VARCHAR# where card_id=#cardId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT distinct A.FAITEM_CODE, (select res_na from as_lang_trans alt where alt.res_id = A.FAITEM_CODE) FAITEM_NAME, A.ROW_INDEX, A.COL_INDEX, A.IS_RO, A.IS_VISI, A.IS_NULL A_IS_NULL, A.IS_MODIFY, B.DATA_TYPE, B.F_REF_NAME, B.IS_FPK, B.VAL_SET_ID, B.IS_NULL B_IS_NULL, B.IS_PK, B.F_FIELD FROM V_ZC_FA_CARD_STYLD A, AS_TAB_COL B WHERE A.CARD_STYL_CODE = #value# AND B.TAB_ID = 'ZC_FA_CARD' AND A.FAITEM_CODE = B.DATA_ITEM ORDER BY A.ROW_INDEX, A.COL_INDEX

SELECT FATYPE_CODE AS CODE, PARENT_FATYPE_CODE AS P_CODE, FATYPE_NAME AS NAME, FATYPE_CODE, FATYPE_NAME, FATYPE_DW, USE_LIFE, RESI_RAT from V_ZC_FA_TYPE WHERE (V_ZC_FA_TYPE.FASTAT_CODE = '1' and V_ZC_FA_TYPE.FATYPE_CODE IN (SELECT FATYPE_CODE FROM v_zc_fa_cardstyl_type
CARD_STYL_CODE = #zcText1#) ) order by FATYPE_CODE

select U.EMP_CODE AS USERS_CODE,U.EMP_NAME AS USERS_NAME from V_SF_USER u where u.nd=#nd#
u.co_Code = #coCode#
select CO_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, ND from V_ZC_FA_ORG_VIEW where ND = #nd# and CO_CODE =#coCode# ORDER BY ORG_CODE
select CARD_STYL_CODE, CARD_STYL_NAME, IS_DEPR_STYL, STYL_IMAGES FROM V_ZC_FA_CARD_STYL where IS_DEPR_STYL =#value# ORDER BY CARD_STYL_CODE

SELECT S.FAITEM_CODE, S.IS_NULL, S.IS_MODIFY, T.IS_NULL AS T_IS_NULL FROM V_ZC_FA_CARD_STYLD S, AS_TAB_COL T WHERE S.FAITEM_CODE = T.DATA_ITEM AND S.CARD_STYL_CODE =#value# AND T.TAB_ID = 'ZC_FA_CARD'
select CARD_STYL_CODE, CARD_STYL_NAME, IS_DEPR_STYL, STYL_IMAGES FROM V_ZC_FA_CARD_STYL where card_styl_code =#value#

SELECT HT.ZC_HT_NUM-NVL(HC.COST,0) AS ZC_HT_NUM FROM ZC_XMCG_HT HT, (SELECT HTCD.HT_CODE, SUM(CD.COST) AS COST FROM ZC_FA_CARD_HT HTCD, ZC_FA_CARD CD WHERE HTCD.CARD_ID = CD.CARD_ID GROUP BY HTCD.HT_CODE) HC WHERE HT.ZC_HT_CODE = HC.HT_CODE(+) AND HT.ZC_HT_CODE=#value#
select sum(cd.cost) as cardsum from zc_fa_card_ht htcd, zc_fa_card cd where htcd.card_id = cd.card_id and htcd.ht_code=#value# and cd.CARD_STATU='B' group by htcd.ht_code
